articles.title: DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for U.K. and East Timor
articles.content:
DPRK Public Health Delegation Leaves for U.K. and East Timor
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A DPRK public health delegation led by Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, left here Saturday to participate in the World Hepatitis Summit to be held in the U.K. and the 68th Session of the WHO Regional Committee for Southeast Asia to be held in East Timor.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Here
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Nippon Sport Science University led by Managing Director Kenshiro Matsunami arrived here on Saturday.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Nippon Sport Science University visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Saturday.
					 They laid a floral basket before their statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Sariwon City
articles.content:
Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Erected in Sariwon City
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il were erected in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province.
					 An unveiling ceremony took place on Saturday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae and others, officials concerned, labor innovators, shock brigade members, service personnel, officials, working people, youth and students in the province.
					
					 The statues were unveiled by senior officials of the party, state and army and those of the province. 
					
					 When the statues were unveiled, they shed brilliant rays.
					
					 Laid before the statues was a floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Also laid before the statues were floral baskets in the joint name of the Central Committee of the WPK, the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK and the DPRK Cabinet and in the name of the people of the province.
					
					 Placed then were floral baskets in the names of the party and power bodies, working people's organizations, institutions, industrial establishments, farms and universities in the province and units of the KPA and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces.
					
					 All the participants paid high tribute to the great leaders before their statues.
					
					 Kim Yong Nam, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, made an unveiling address.
					
					 The erection of the statues in the province is a noteworthy, historic event of weighty significance in glorifying the sacred revolutionary careers and feats of the great leaders for all ages, the speaker said, and continued: 
					
					 The great leaders provided meticulous guidance to North Hwanghae Province, wisely leading the party work, economy and culture and all other affairs in the province.  
					
					 He called upon the officials, party members and all other people in the province to regard the behests of the great leaders as important guidelines, implement them unconditionally without an inch of deflection and concession and uphold the leadership of Kim Jong Un with pure conscience and obligation.
					
					 The participants were briefed on the statues before going round them.

articles.title: Chairman of DPRK-Japan Friendship Association Meets Leading Members of Japanese Delegation
articles.content:
Chairman of DPRK-Japan Friendship Association Meets Leading Members of Japanese Delegation
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Pak Kun Gwang, chairman of the DPRK-Japan Friendship Association, met and had a talk with the leading members of the visiting delegation of Nippon Sport Science University led by Managing Director Kenshiro Matsunami at Pyongyang Koryo Hotel on Saturday.

articles.title: 1st International Symposium on Japan's Distortion of History of Aggression Held
articles.content:
1st International Symposium on Japan's Distortion of History of Aggression Held
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The 1st international symposium on Japan's distortion of history of aggression took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Saturday.
					 Present there were teachers, researchers and officials concerned in the fields of social science and education including the Academy of Social Sciences and Kim Il Sung University and delegations and delegates of China. 
					
					 Speakers said that the symposium will contribute to disclosing with bitterness the crime-woven history committed by the Japanese imperialists and preserving peace in Northeast Asia. 
					
					 Then, papers were heard there.
					
					 Speakers said that the history of aggression committed by Japan in the past is the hideous crimes unprecedented in the history of mankind which threatened the existence of Korea and other Asian countries and the blood-stained history of killings and plunder.
					
					 They noted that no matter how much water may flow under the bridge and how many times rivers and mountains may change, the crime-woven history of Japan is the truth of history that can never be covered up. They also disclosed atrocities the Japanese imperialists committed against the Korean and other Asian people including the Ulmi incident of 1895, massacre of Koreans and Nanjing massacre.
					
					 They urged the Japanese authorities to clearly understand the demand of the era and the trend of the times and make a thorough-going apology and reparation for the crimes committed against the Korean and other Asian people in the past.

articles.title: U.S. Should Face up to Trend of Times
articles.content:
U.S. Should Face up to Trend of Times
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Frants Klinchevichi, a deputy to the Russian State Duma, commenting on the recent situation on the Korean Peninsula, asserted that the essence of the problem lies in that the U.S. and south Korea are working hard to bring down the social system in the DPRK by force.
					 What is important is for south Korea and the U.S. to fully understand that any attempt to bring down the social system by force may lead not only to a big war on the Korean Peninsula but to a serious global catastrophe, he noted.
					
					 This indicates that far-sighted and reasonable politicians have focused their attention on the U.S. act of aggression that brings a grave catastrophe not only to Korea but to other parts of the world.
					
					 It is 70 years since the end of the Second World War and the split of the Korean nation but the Korean Peninsula still remains the most unstable and complicated hot spot in the world.
					
					 The U.S. has not recognized the ideology, social system and sovereignty of the DPRK but persistently pursued its hostile policy toward the DPRK in a bid to bring down the social system chosen by its people. It has resorted to military threat and blackmail against the DPRK while steadily reinforcing armed forces and staging war maneuvers after making all legal and institutional mechanisms against it.
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK has brought pain and misfortune resulting from division, chilled the desire of Koreans for reunification and laid obstacles in the way of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 The U.S. cooked up false cases and staged joint military exercises whenever the north-south relations got relaxed and the enthusiasm of the Korean nation for reunification ran high.
					
					 It is getting frantic with north-targeted nuclear war exercises by introducing huge nuclear war hardware into south Korea and its vicinity. Consequently, the Asia-Pacific Region including the Korean Peninsula has become a hot spot.
					
					 The ever more intensified large-scale joint military exercises of the U.S. in south Korea are not simply targeted against the DPRK only.
					
					 The Korean Peninsula is located in the very important strategic vantage in the Asia-Pacific and interests of big powers are complicatedly intertwined there. A war to break out on the peninsula will precisely mean a nuclear war and this cannot but spill over to its neighboring countries and escalate into a global nuclear war.
					
					 The issue of ensuring peace and security on the Korean Peninsula is a pressing issue directly linked with guaranteeing global peace and security.
					
					 It is by no means fortuitous that many countries of the world are paying keen attention to the issue of ensuring peace, feeling uneasiness and concern whenever tensions escalate on the peninsula.
					
					 The publication of the joint press release at the north-south high-level emergency contact marked an important turning occasion in defusing acute military tension and converting the catastrophic north-south relations into ones of reconciliation and trust.
					
					 If one truly wants global peace and stability, one should value the positive situation on the peninsula and sincerely work for the final solution to the Korean issue.
					
					 This is the trend of the development of history in the present century.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to behave properly, though belatedly, as it spawned the nuclear issue of the Korean Peninsula and has disturbed peace.

articles.title: Sports Village in Mt. Paektu Area Takes on New Looks
articles.content:
Sports Village in Mt. Paektu Area Takes on New Looks
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Sports village in the area of Mt. Paektu undergoes a radical change amid a brisk campaign to better Samjiyon County of Ryanggang Province in the DPRK.
					 10-odd objects in the sports village is now being renovated at a fast tempo, among them ice hockey gymnasium, speed skating rink, alpine skiing ground and lodging quarters for sportspersons.
					
					 Besides the sports village, more than 50 objects in the county are built or repaired, including Samjiyon Schoolchildren's Palace, Samjiyon County Hall of Culture and Pegaebong Noodle House, while minor power stations undergo technical modernization.

articles.title: Photoluminescent Decoration of Koryo Celadon Developed
articles.content:
Photoluminescent Decoration of Koryo Celadon Developed
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Porcelain Creative Group of the Mansudae Art Studio in the DPRK has recently succeeded in developing photoluminescent decoration of Koryo celadon. 
					 Koryo celadon decorated with photoluminescent material looks normal in daylight, but radiates elegant bluish-white light at night, giving 3D effect.
					
					 If it is basked in the sun for one minute, it shines for nearly two hours in darkness. 10 minutes' basking makes it diffuse light for over 10 hours.
					
					 The decoration was registered as a patent of the DPRK.

articles.title: Memorial Service for Victims of Ukishima-maru Incident Held in Japan
articles.content:
Memorial Service for Victims of Ukishima-maru Incident Held in Japan
						
 Tokyo, August 28 (KNS-KCNA) -- A memorial service took place at Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture of Japan on August 24, 70 years since thousands of Koreans on their way to the homeland after its liberation were mercilessly killed due to the explosion of the ship Ukishima-maru deliberately caused by the Japanese imperialists.
					 Present there were Kim Sang Il, chairman of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Ha Sang Thae, chief of the Kyoto Prefectural Headquarters of the south Korean Residents Association in Japan, Japanese personages and citizens.
					
					 Speakers deplored that Koreans lost their lives due to such atrocity of the Japanese imperialists as blowing up the ship carrying them to their homeland.
					
					 The truth behind the incident has not yet been probed and Japan has not yet made any apology and reparation, they said.
					
					 Probe into the truth behind the incident brooks no further delay in order to have the grudge of the victims settled, they stressed.

articles.title: Japan Should Come Clean with Its Crime-woven History: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan Should Come Clean with Its Crime-woven History: Rodong Sinmun
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Japan invaded Korea and committed the thrice-cursed crimes against the Korean people in the past, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					Japan left no means and methods untried to exterminate the Korean nation and erase Korea on the world map in the past.
					
					 It is an undeniable historical fact that Koreans suffered untold damage due to Japan. 
					
					 The issue of Japan's redemption of its past should have been settled right after the end of the Second World War.
					
					 But it has remained unsettled still now.
					
					It is because the ruling forces of Japan have distorted its past history contrary to the will of its people to redeem the past and advance along a right way.
					
					 All successive ruling forces in Japan have shunned overtly and covertly the redemption of its past, embellishing its crime-woven past history.
					
					 Japan has maintained the stand of never admitting its past crimes against the Korean people.
					
					 Such stand makes it hard to convert the hostile relations between the DPRK and Japan into normal ones.
					
					 The issue of Japan's settlement of its past is not merely confined to the DPRK-Japan relations.
					
					 Whether Japan redeems its past or not is a barometer judging whether it admits its past crimes or not, repeats its crime-woven history or not, and has will to take the road of peace or not. It is also a very sensitive political matter concerning peace and security in Asia.
					
					 For Japan to come clean with its past crimes is the only way to become a full-fledged member of the international community.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Denounce Japan for Evading Responsibility for Sexual Slavery
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Denounce Japan for Evading Responsibility for Sexual Slavery 
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- More than 20 organizations in south Korea including the Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps issued a press release on Aug. 28 denouncing Japan for its shameless attitude of evading the responsibility for sexual slavery in the past.
					 The organizations charged that the demand of the victims for solution to the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army has not been met still today, the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					
					 Japan is denying the crimes including the colonial rule in the past, war of aggression and hurling of many women into shambles of war as sexual slaves and evading the responsibility for them, they held.
					
					 They lashed out at Japanese Prime Minister Abe for issuing a statement marking the 70 years since its defeat in which he didn't refer to the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army and deceived victims with his brazen-faced wordplay. 
					
					 They demanded Japan recognize the state responsibility for the sexual slavery and make an official apology and reparation for the past wrongdoings.

articles.title: S. Korean Local Prosecutor's Office Arrests Members of Progressive Organization
articles.content:
S. Korean Local Prosecutor's Office Arrests Members of Progressive Organization 
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Seoul Central District Prosecutor's Office arrested and indicted the director for Foreign Cooperation of the Korea Solidarity for Independent Reunification and Democracy on Aug. 26.
					 In the wake of arresting and indicting two executive members of the solidarity under the pretext of the "formation of enemy-benefiting organization", the prosecution authorities took such action on charges that the director supported the north and called for the withdrawal of the U.S. forces and the reunification by federal formula.
					
					 The prosecution authorities declared that they would thoroughly investigate core members of the solidarity, the progressive pro-reunification movement organization.

articles.title: Celebration Events Held in Russia
articles.content:
Celebration Events Held in Russia
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Events took place at Bureya Railway Station and the Bureya Hydro-electric Plant in Amur Region, Russia on August 21 to celebrate the 4th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's historic visit to the Siberian and Far Eastern regions of the Russian Federation.
					 Displayed at their venues were photos of President Kim Il Sung visiting the Soviet Union and Kim Jong Il touring the Russian Federation.
					
					 Present there were personages of the government of the Amur Region, the railway station and the hydro-electric plant and masses.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK vice consul general and consuls in Khabarovsk and officials from different units working in the region.
					
					 The participants laid floral baskets and bouquets before the tablet to honor Kim Jong Il and monument to his visit to the hydro-electric plant.
					
					 The representative of the Russian Foreign Ministry in Blagobeshensk City of the region said that the region recorded a clear page in the history of the Russia-DPRK friendship as it is a significant place visited by Kim Jong Il in the last period of his life.
					
					 He expressed hope that the Russia-DPRK friendly and cooperative relations which developed under the deep care of Kim Jong Il would grow stronger, adding that the joint event marking Kim Jong Il's historic visit to the region would continue to be held as a tradition.
					
					 An advisor to the minister of external economic relations, tourism and business of the government of the region stressed that he would make positive efforts to make the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries yield more noticeable substantial results.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Organizations
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits Praised by Foreign Organizations
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Foreign organizations posted articles on their websites between August 13 and 17 on the occasion of the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The France-Korea Friendship Association said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung liberated the country by wisely leading the protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle and founded the DPRK on September 9, 1948.
					
					 The recent institution of Pyongyang time in the DPRK is to eliminate the leftover of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule.
					
					 Japan has not yet made any apology and reparation to the Korean people for its past crimes.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism noted in an article titled "President Kim Il Sung, legendary guerrilla":
					
					 The President commanded the protracted anti-Japanese armed struggle under the situation where there was neither state-backed rear nor assistance of a regular army.
					
					 He set forth the line of armed struggle and founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army on April 25, 1932.
					
					 He smashed the numerical and technical advantages of the enemies with his mysterious strategies, tactics and war methods and led the anti-Japanese war to victory, accomplishing the historic cause of national liberation on August 15, 1945.
					
					 His great personality will go down in history.
					
					 The Brazilian Center for the Study of the Juche Idea also edited an article praising his exploits for national liberation.

articles.title: Korea's Liberation Day Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Korea's Liberation Day Marked Abroad 
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- There took place seminars in UK, Bulgaria, Ethiopia and Indonesia from August 10 to 13 to mark the 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation. 
					 The chairman of the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea at a joint seminar on the theme "Juche idea and 70th anniversary of Korea's liberation" said President Kim Il Sung founded the Korean People's Revolutionary Army, waged an armed struggle against the brigandish Japanese imperialists armed to the teeth and thereby liberated Korea. 
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain said the President made efforts for true unity and equality among the revolutionary parties, adding his life was the great one guided by the Juche idea. 
					
					 The chairman of the Bulgarian Communists' Party, the acting chief of Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, the chief of the Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism and other reporters and speakers said Korea's liberation was the historical event as it opened rosy prospect for the Korean people for building a new country and carving out the independent destiny. They highly lauded the President for liberating Korea. 
					
					 The chief of a branch of the Ethiopian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism said August 15, 1945 was the historical turning point for the Korean people. 
					
					 A congratulatory letter and message to Marshal Kim Jong Un were adopted at seminars held in UK and Bulgaria.

articles.title: Bangladeshi Personage Supports DPRK's Just Cause
articles.content:
Bangladeshi Personage Supports DPRK's Just Cause 
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, made public a statement on August 20 on the occasion of the Day of Songun. 
					 The chairman paid highest tribute to leader Kim Jong Il who made an immortal contribution to accomplishing the cause of global independence with his invincible Songun politics and extended warm congratulations to the Korean people on the occasion of the historic day when he started the Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					
					 Today the DPRK under the leadership of H.E. Kim Jong Un is dynamically advancing for the final victory in the drive for the building of a thriving socialist nation despite the challenges of the imperialists, he noted.
					
					 He wished the Korean people success in their struggle for building a thriving socialist nation and achieving the independent and peaceful reunification of the country under the outstanding Songun revolutionary leadership of Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 He voiced full support and solidarity with the just cause of socialist Korea.

articles.title: Russian Papers Introduce DPRK
articles.content:
Russian Papers Introduce DPRK 
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The 31st issue  of Pravda Primoriya, the organ of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation, dedicated two whole pages to a travelogue on the DPRK by the editor-in-chief of the paper of his party under the title "Land of morning calm". 
					 The paper said some foreign media are conducting false propaganda about the DPRK. 
					
					 Just are the efforts of the Korean people to firmly protect what they have gained at the cost of blood despite the U.S. moves, the paper noted, and went on:
					
					 When the former Soviet Union and other anti-U.S. countries collapsed in face of the U.S. offensive of "democracy," the DPRK, not a big country, has pursued its unique independent policy and defended collectivism, confidently advancing despite harsh sanctions. 
					
					 The DPRK is pursuing the Songun politics. 
					
					 It is focusing efforts on bolstering up the national defence capability. It had access to nukes and launched satellites by its own efforts. 
					
					 All this  is necessary to cope with the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and its ally south Korean authorities and it is all the more so under the present situation where south Korea has turned into a nuclear arsenal of the U.S.
					
					 The paper carried photos taken by the members of the visiting group. 
					
					 The Russian paper Bremya Peremon Plus TV Nos from 29 to 32 carried similar news.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Ridicules U.S. Korea Policy
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Ridicules U.S. Korea Policy 
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Lunatic asylum of Washington" denouncing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK on August 21. 
					 The article said:
					
					 Obama is now revealing his wretched plight as a psychopath bereft of his ability to discern things and self-restraint. 
					
					 This well illustrated by the U.S. Korea policy being pursued by him. 
					
					 He must be a sleep walker as he uttered that the DPRK "deserves an early collapse" though it is making a leap forward towards a thriving socialist nation amid the people's absolute trust and support and the world's admiration. 
					
					 It is the empire of America called the second Roman Empire that is rapidly declining with its days numbered. 
					
					 Obama is obsessed with such bad blood toward the DPRK that he has gone totally crazy. 
					
					 Not only Obama but almost all heavyweights in the his administration are called psychopaths. 
					
					 Many media of the world ridicule the Obama Administration as "Lunatic asylum of Washington".

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of WPK Founding to Be Celebrated in Iran
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of WPK Founding to Be Celebrated in Iran
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee of the Islamic Coalition Party of Iran for celebrating the 70th anniversary of the founding of the Workers' Party of Korea was inaugurated in Tehran on August 24. 
					 Hamid Reza Taraghi, vice-general secretary of the party, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee. 
					
					 The committee decided to significantly organize colorful political and cultural events on the anniversary.

articles.title: Russian Body Hails DPRK's Measures for Peace
articles.content:
Russian Body Hails DPRK's Measures for Peace 
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Russian Group for Solidarity with the DPRK on August 23 made public a statement in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean authorities' Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills (UFG). 
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities staged the joint military drills to stifle the DPRK by mobilizing huge armed forces for aggression. 
					
					 The south Korean people demand a stop to UFG which is worsening the situation on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 But the south Korean authorities are cracking down on the people. 
					
					 We support all the measures and stand of the DPRK for protecting peace on the Korean Peninsula. 
					
					 The international community should clearly know who are true aggressors. 
					
					 The world people do not want a horrible war.

articles.title: Nigerian Body Demands Halt to Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Nigerian Body Demands Halt to Joint Military Drills
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website an article titled "Halt to joint military drills is touchstone for ensuring peace" on August 22. 
					 The article said the Korean Peninsula is the biggest hotspot in the world. 
					
					 The U.S., the largest nuclear power in the world, stages large-scale war drills for aggression near the Korean Peninsula, different from other military drills. 
					
					 The danger of the war drills will never reduce though a "visiting group" is invited to the military drills. 
					
					 It is illogical to compare the joint military drills by the U.S. with huge armed forces including preemptive nuclear strike means involved with the military training by the Korean People's Army. 
					
					 Not a few U.S. experts for Korean issue recognize that halt to the joint military drills is a precondition for the settlement of the Korean issue.
					
					 Whether the U.S. stops the joint military drills, the most vivid expression of its hostile policy toward the DPRK, or not, serves as a touchstone judging whether it wants to solve the Korean issue peacefully or not.

articles.title: U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Denounced by Canadian Political Party
articles.content:
U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills Denounced by Canadian Political Party
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Communist Party of Canada (Marxist－Leninist) posted on its website an article denouncing the U.S. and south Korean authorities' moves for aggression against the DPRK on Aug. 24.
					 The article said that the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises are further escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The joint military exercises are bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 This being a hard fact, the U.S. is describing such exercises as the "regular and open ones" and "transparent and normal ones".
					
					  It is creating an impression that the presence of the U.S. forces aimed at stifling the DPRK in south Korea is the normal state and they are not the main factor of increasing the danger of a war and making the situation instable.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are getting hell-bent on tarnishing the image of the DPRK which is making every possible effort for peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The U.S. should conclude a peace pact with the DPRK and withdraw its troops from south Korea.

articles.title: Bulgarian Party Denounces U.S. and South Korea's Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
Bulgarian Party Denounces U.S. and South Korea's Moves against DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Bulgarian Communists' Party made public a statement on August 24 denouncing the U.S. and south Korean authorities' undisguised moves for aggression against the DPRK. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 Recently the U.S., head of the world imperialists, together with the south Korean authorities, is kicking off rackets against the DPRK. 
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are ceaselessly staging joint military drills for aggression and are getting hell-bent on arms buildup. 
					
					 We bitterly denounce their anti-DPRK moves for aggression and demand an immediate stop to them. 
					
					 We fully support the efforts of the DPRK to protect peace and security on the Korean Peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia. 
					
					 The Korean people will surely win in the struggle to drive the U.S. troops out of the Korean Peninsula and reunify the country independently and peacefully.

articles.title: Swedish, Polish Bodies Demand Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Swedish, Polish Bodies Demand Stop to U.S.-S. Korea Joint Military Drills
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- Swedish and Polish organizations made public statements on August 24 and 25 in denunciation of the U.S. and south Korean authorities' undisguised moves for aggression. 
					 The Sweden-Korea Friendship Association said that the situation on the Korean Peninsula is worsening owing to the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills (UFG). 
					
					 UFG is aimed at a sudden attack on the DPRK and "occupation of Pyongyang," the statement noted, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities should stop at once the moves aggravating tension on the Korean Peninsula including the joint military drills for aggression. 
					
					 The U.S. should withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea and refrain from blocking the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea. 
					
					 The Poland branch of the Korean Friendship Association in a statement said:
					
					 70 years have passed since Korea was divided owing to the outside forces. 
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. withdraw its troops from south Korea. 
					
					 We support the peaceful reunification of Korea and urge the U.S. and south Korean authorities to stop at once their anti-DPRK moves for aggression. 
					
					 We extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their just struggle to protect the sovereignty and dignity of the country.

articles.title: Ecuadorian Body, Indian Personage Denounce U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills
articles.content:
Ecuadorian Body, Indian Personage Denounce U.S.-South Korea Joint Military Drills 
						
 Pyongyang, August 29 (KCNA) -- The Guaranda Association for Friendship, Culture and Solidarity with the Korean People of Ecuador made public a statement on August 22 in denunciation of the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills (UFG). 
					 The statement said this proves that the U.S. and south Korean authorities are working hard to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and kill the Korean people. 
					
					 They will be sternly punished by the service personnel and people of the DPRK, the statement said, adding that the Korean people will smash all the moves of the warmongers and surely reunify the country. 
					
					 Vipin Gupta, chairman of the Juche Philosophy Study Committee of India, in a statement on August 24 said UFG was the dangerous one for invading the DPRK. 
					
					 The reality clearly shows that the U.S. is disturbing peace and stability of the Korean Peninsula and the region and escalating tension, he said, demanding that the U.S. and south Korean authorities immediately stop the joint military drills in order to defuse tension on the peninsula and achieve the peace and stability of the world.

articles.title: Levantadas en Sariwon estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Levantadas en Sariwon estatuas de bronce de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il 
						
Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ACNC) -- Fueron levantadas las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il en la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 29 la ceremonia de descubrimiento de las estatuas de bronce.
					
					Participaron alli Kim Yong Nam, Kim Ki Nam, Choe Ryong Hae y otros cuadros, los funcionarios correspondientes y de las unidades que hicieron aporte al levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce, los ameritados laborales, los miembros de la brigada, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, asi como funcionarios, trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes de la provincia. 
					
					Las estatuas de bronce fueron descubiertas por los cuadros directivos del partido, el Estado, el ejercito y la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte. 
					
					Ante las estatuas de bronce fue colocado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. 
					
					Tambien fueron puestos un cesto de flores a nombre comun del Comite Central del PTC, el Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema y el Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y el otro a nombre de los habitantes de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte.
					
					Luego, fueron depositados los otros a nombre de los organismos del partido y el poder, entidades de masas, organos, empresas, fabricas, granjas y universidades a todos los niveles, unidades del EPC y del Ejercito de Seguridad Interior del Pueblo de Corea, etc. 
					
					Todos los participantes rindieron sublime homenaje a los grandes lideres.
					
					El discurso de ocasion estuvo a cargo de Kim Yong Nam, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la RPDC.
					
					El orador dijo que el levantamiento de las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres en la provincia es un acontecimiento de gran importancia para glorificar eternamente sus sagradas vidas y hazanas revolucionarias.
					
					Recordo que los lideres antecesores realizaron en varias ocasiones las visitas de orientacion a la provincia conduciendo sabiamente las labores partidistas, economicas, culturales y las otras en conjunto. 
					
					Dijo que gracias al Mariscal Kim Jong Un se ha realizado el ardiente deseo de los habitantes provinciales de levantar las estatuas de bronce de los grandes lideres. 
					
					Llamo a todos los funcionarios, militantes del partido y trabajadores de la provincia a materializar incondicionalmente los legados de los grandes lideres considerandolos como guias programaticas y apoyar con pura conciencia y obligacion moral la orientacion del Mariscal. 
					
					Tras escuchar las explicaciones sobre las estatuas de bronce, los participantes las recorrieron.

articles.title: Efectuado seminario internacional relativo a tergiversacion de historia de agresion de Japon
articles.content:
Efectuado seminario internacional relativo a tergiversacion de historia de agresion de Japon
						
   Pyongyang, 29 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 29 en el Palacio Cultural del Pueblo el primer seminario academico internacional relativo a la tergiversacion de historia de agresion de Japon.
					   En el acto estuvieron presentes los profesores e investigadores de las ramas de ciencias sociales y educacion inclusive la Academia de Ciencias Sociales y la Universidad Kim Il Sung y los funcionarios de sector correspondiente, asi como varias delegaciones y delegados de China.
					
					   Los oradores senalaron que el presente seminario contribuira a revelar la historia sangrienta llena de crimenes cometidos por los imperialistas japoneses y a defender la paz de la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Seguidamente, se presentaron las disertaciones intituladas "Crimenes del pasado de Japon y el verdadero objetivo de  tergiversacion de su historia agresiva", "Acto de tergiversacion de historia de Japon que niega la violacion de derechos humanos de las mujeres de categoria especial", "Crimenes gangsteres del imperialismo japones que impuso a Corea la hora estandar de Japon exterminando la hora de Corea", etc.
					
					   Los oradores dijeron que la pasada historia de agresion de Japon esta llena de crimenes de categoria especial, la matanza y usurpacion sin precedentes en la historia de la humanidad, que amenazaron la existencia de Corea y de los paises asiaticos.
					
					   Aseveraron que tal historia de Japon no sera ocultada ni borrada aunque transcurra el tiempo y revelaron los hechos de masacre cometido por el imperialismo nipon contra el pueblo coreano y los demas asiaticos, incluso el incidente de Ulmi, el masacre de creanos, el de Nanjing, etc.
					
					   Demandaron energicamente que las autoridades japonesas pidan disculpas y reflexionen por sus crimenes cometidos en el pasado contra el pueblo coreano y los otros asiaticos, dandose clara cuenta de la demanda y la corriente de la epoca.
